sections.purpose: To rapidly filter liquids using vacuum assistance for sterilization or clarification.
sections.scope: Applicable to microbiological sample preparation and sterility tests.
procedure: Assemble the filtration unit and connect it to a vacuum source.
Place the appropriate membrane or filter paper on the support.
Secure the funnel and pour the sample into it.
After filtration, release the vacuum before disassembling.
Collect the filtrate or membrane for further processing.
Clean and disinfect all components after use.
precautions: Ensure all glassware used under vacuum is free from cracks.
Prevent backflow of liquid into the vacuum line.
Use membranes compatible with the sample and solvent.
Dispose of used filters as biohazard waste if contaminated.
